pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.extraction

Class CommitInfoExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.extraction.CommitInfoExtractor

  • public class CommitInfoExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Extractor of relevant commit information from JGit's RevCommit objects. It stores CommitInfo objects.
    Author:
    Adam Wierzbicki

    • Method Detail

      • extractCommitInfo

        public void extractCommitInfo(org.eclipse.jgit.revwalk.RevCommit commit)
        Extract & store relevant information about a given commit. This method checks, whether the commit is a bugfix by performing a simple regex match.
        Parameters:
        commit - Commit to extract information from

      • updateNumChanges

        public void updateNumChanges(ch.uzh.ifi.seal.changedistiller.model.entities.StructureEntityVersion version)
        Add the number of changes in a given structure entity version, to the total sum of changes in the commit associated with this version.
        Parameters:
        version - Structure entity version to get number of changes from

      • getCommitInfo

        public CommitInfo getCommitInfo(java.lang.String commitId)
        Get a CommitInfo object for a given commit ID.
        Parameters:
        commitId - Commit ID to get commit info for
        Returns:
        Commit info for the given ID (null if the given ID has no mapping)

      • getAllCommitInfos

        public java.lang.Iterable<CommitInfo> getAllCommitInfos()
        Get information extracted from all commits.
        Returns:
        An iterable of CommitInfo objects

      • isBugfix

        private boolean isBugfix(java.lang.String message)
        Check if a given commit message indicates that commit is a bug-fix.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to check
        Returns:
        True iff commit is a bug-fix
